snippet.title: Wish Us Luck - Steam trailer - wishlist now!
snippet.description:
Play three characters and make hard decisions to outsmart chance and make it in the big city. This is Wish Us Luck. A single-player interactive fiction with intertwined stories and multiple endings.

Coming soon on PC, iPhone and Android. Wishlist it on Steam now.
